title: Captain America by Brubaker (2005-2013|100%|D+S|MM+E+DCP|5/6)
description:
For an explanation of the purpose of this torrent, please see the first part.
Part 1 -    <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9618264" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9618264</a>
Part 2 -    <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9618302" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9618302</a>
Part 3 -    <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9618339" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9618339</a>
Part 4 -    <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9619892" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9619892</a>

Part 5 - Captain America v6 + Winter Soldier (7 Folders): This part of the collection concludes Brubaker's incredible run, in the pages of Vol 6 of CA and the first volume of Winter Soldier. Steve and Bucky are faced with dire circumstances as a result of the Fear Itself crossover, and both have to come to terms with new threats and personal tragedy. 

25 American Dreamers (CA v6 01-05)
26 The Longest Winter (FI 7.1, WS 01-05)
27 Powerless (CA v6 06-10)
28 Broken Arrow (WS 06-09)
29 Shock To The System (CA v6 11-14)
30 Black Widow Hunt (WS 10-14)
31 New World Orders + Finale (CA v6 15-19)

There is some wonky stuff going on here for some of these issues; although theoretically all are digital copies, I think some of the sources I used mislabled the Captain America issues in some parts, as the bitsize does not match up with what it should be. However, I re-downloaded some of them from direct sources myself and having checked all the issues, they at least LOOK right and read right, so take that as you will. Also, the issues of the WInter Soldier have multiple digital editions available; I elected to use a majority of one over the other due to resolution and availability. All issues are ostensibly Digital by Zone-Empire or Minutemen-InnerDemons including the Fear Itself single, except for Captain America 17 which is from TLK-Empire. Thanks very much to them for their work; please seed and enjoy! :-)
